2","dweb:/ipfs/Qmax9WHBnVsZP46ZxEMNRQpLQnrdE4dK8LehML1Py8FowF"]}},"version":1}

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

returns._0: active True if the basket is active

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

params.targetWeightsBps: New target weights in basis points

getBasketCount().notice: Gets the total number of registered baskets

getVault(string).notice: Gets the vault address for a basket

isBasketActive(string).notice: Checks if a basket is active

setBasketActive(string,bool).notice: Sets the active status of a basket (owner only)

updateBasketTargets(string,address[],uin.notice: Updates basket target tokens and weights (owner only)
